MonsterTrait.Name: Flyby
MonsterTrait.Text: The aridni doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The aridni has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The aridni's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells: At will: dancing lights, detect magic, invisibility 3/day: charm person, faerie fire, mage armor 1/day: spike growth

MonsterAction.Name: Short Sword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Pixie Bow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Slaver Arrows
MonsterTrait.Text: An aridni can add a magical effect in addition to the normal damage done by its arrows. If so, the aridni chooses from the following effects:
Confusion. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become confused (as the spell) for 2d4-1 rounds.
Fear. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 2d4 rounds.
Hideous Laughter. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become incapacitated for 2d4 rounds. While incapacitated, the target is prone and laughing uncontrollably.
Sleep. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or fall asleep for 2d4 minutes. The creature wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.
